Posts.Content: Hi, I had my first course of Chemo a month ago and i have had to stop due to my stomach churning. I find it very hard to eat as my stomach curns all the time. I have lost 10 pounds but my weight has now stabalised but i still have trouble eating. Any thought or help so i can get back on track with my treatment Many thanks Sandra
Posts.Title: Stomach churnings

Posts.Content: dear debbie thank you for your help i am starting on chemo next week so hope it goes ok thanks sandra
